title: Lignocellulosic biomass-based materials: a promising resource for viable energy storage
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1823-1871
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00038B, Review Article
Md. Merajul Islam
The focus and driving force behind the advancement of energy storage devices is the demand for the development of electrochemical energy storage systems using abundant, renewable, eco-friendly, and cost-effective materials.
